- *采集日內數據、數據流、`sparklyr`等等。*
- *高頻算法量化交易等等。*
- *統計建模、交易策略、風險管理等等。*

<br>

**Github倉庫**：[**Analysing Financial Report of ALI（分析阿裏財務報表）**](https://github.com/englianhu/report)

- *Analyse the financial report and stock price of Ali lottery.*
- *Analyse the profit and loss of customers and products, customers' consuming habit.*

<br>

**Github倉庫**：[**Analysing Financial Report of Bookmakers（分析博彩公司財務報告）**](https://github.com/scibrokes/analyse-the-finance-and-stocks-price-of-bookmakers)

- *分析上市公司的財務報表與股價。*
- *分析新寶1與新寶2的財務報表。*

<br>

**Github倉庫**：[**binary.com : Job Application - Quantitative Analyst（binary.com：申請量化交昜員崗位）**](https://github.com/englianhu/binary.com-interview-question)

- *回測金融投註建模與投註策刂略。*
- *回測Arima、平滑模型與各種Garch模型，並且凱利投註模型等等。*
- *彌補缺失值數據與回測高頻率交昜。*

<br>

**Github倉庫**：[**Betting Strategy and Model Validation（博彩交昜策刂略與模型驗證）**](https://github.com/scibrokes/Betting-Strategy-and-Model-Validation)

- *使用Selenium和Phantomjs軟件采集網絡足球彩券與賽事數據。*
- *自然語言分析采集來的足球賽事數據，自動匹配球隊隊名與對沖基金的註單賽事隊名。*
- *運用不同的凱利標準杠桿投註。*

<br>

**Github倉庫**：[**Introducing ®Studio Server for Data Scientists（為數據科學們介紹®Studio服務器）**](https://github.com/scibrokes/setup-rstudio-server)

- *如何在centOS7操作繫統建立自己的RStudio與Shiny應用的教程。*

<br>

**Github倉庫**：[**Application of Kelly Criterion model in Sportsbook Investment（在博彩行業中應用凱利標準模型進行投資）**](https://github.com/scibrokes/kelly-criterion)

- *應用加權對角通膨雙變量泊松模型，而足球賽事的數據采集於* **WebDriver Dynamic Webpage Scrapping** *。*
- *應用凱利標準模型，投註於10家博彩公司的英國2011/12與2012/13賽季的賽事。*

<br>

**Github倉庫**：[**Dixon-Coles1996（迪克遜-克爾斯1996統計模型）**](https://github.com/scibrokes/Dixon-Coles1996)

- *Dixon & Coles 1996 足球得分建模。*

<br>

**Github倉庫**：[**WebDriver Dynamic Webpage Scrapping（網絡驅動程序與采集動態網頁信息）**](https://github.com/scibrokes/WebDriver-DynamicWebpage-Scrapping)

- *使用RSelenium與Python軟件，從[7M](http://odds.7m.hk/en)和[NowGoal](http://info.nowgoal.com/en)網站采集博彩公司的賠率數據與賽事比分。*

<br>

**Github倉庫**：[**Soccer League Web Scraping（采集網上足球聯賽信息）**](https://github.com/scibrokes/Soccer-League-Web-Scraping)

- *采集靜態網頁足球賽事數據。*

<br>

**Github倉庫**：[**Odds Modelling and Testing Inefficiency of Sports-Bookmakers（賠率建模與測試體育博彩莊家的低效率）**](https://github.com/scibrokes/odds-modelling-and-testing-inefficiency-of-sports-bookmakers)

- *手動收集[500WAN](http://www.500wan.com)、[BET007](http://www.bet007.com)與[NowGoal](http://info.nowgoal.com/en)網站的足球賽事比分與29家博彩公司的1x2、亞洲盤、大小盤的賠率，所有數據包括從2006至2011的數據。*
- *應用加權對角通膨雙變量泊松模型，測試投註與回酬。*

## 技能

```{r skill, echo = FALSE, result = 'asis'}
require('dplyr', quietly = TRUE, warn.conflicts = FALSE)
require('magrittr', quietly = TRUE, warn.conflicts = FALSE)
require('formattable', quietly = TRUE, warn.conflicts = FALSE)
require('knitr', quietly = TRUE, warn.conflicts = FALSE)
require('kableExtra', quietly = TRUE, warn.conflicts = FALSE)

skill <- tibble('技能' = c('計量經濟學', '量化交昜', 'R編程語言', '微軟辦公軟件', 'SQL語言', 'Python編程語言', '數據分析', '客服工作', '體育博彩行業', '建立RStudio服務器', '統計學', '數據科學', 'Shiny應用', 'Linux操作繫統', 'Web API應用程序接口', 'Sparklyr大數據分析', '張量Tensorflow', 'Web Driver驅動器瀏覽器', 'FrontPage / 部署網站', 'Photoshop / Picsart'), '程度' = c(9, 9, 9, 8, 3, 4, 9, 9, 7, 7, 6, 8, 8, 7, 6, 2, 2, 4, 3, 5))
skill <- tibble('序列' = 1:nrow(skill), skill)

skill |> 
    {\(.) dplyr::mutate(
      ., `技能` = cell_spec(`技能`, italic = TRUE, 
                           color = spec_color(seq(nrow(skill)), option = 'A', 
                                              begin = 0.1, end = 0.9), 
                           tooltip = paste0('程度: ', `程度`), angle = 3))}() |>#, 
    #Level = color_tile('#FFFDDC', 'darkgoldenrod')(Level)) |> 
  {\(.) mutate_if(., is.numeric, function(x){ 
    cell_spec(x, 'html', color = 
                spec_color(x, option = 'A', begin = 0.1, end = 0.9, 
                           direction = -1), angle = 20, 
              font_size = spec_font_size(x), bold = TRUE) })}() |> 
  {\(.) kbl(., caption = '技能評估（從新兵1至專業10）', escape = FALSE, align = 'c')}() |> 
  {\(.) kable_styling(., bootstrap_options = c('striped', 'hover', 'condensed', 'responsive'))}() |> 
  {\(.) row_spec(., 0, background = 'DimGrey', color = 'yellow')}()# %>% 
  #column_spec(1, background = 'CornflowerBlue', color = 'red') %>% 
  #column_spec(2, background = 'grey', color = 'black') %>% 
  #column_spec(2, background = 'grey', color = 'black')
```

```{r skill2A, eval = FALSE, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE, echo = FALSE, result = 'asis'}
skill[,-1] |> 
  {\(.) tibble(.) |> 
      recharts::echartr(., 
        x = ~`技能`, y = ~`程度`, series = ~`技能`, type = 'radar', 
        symbolList = 'none', #palette=c('firebrick1','dodgerblue'), 
        title = '技能評估', subtitle = '(by @englianhu)')}() |> 
  {\(.) recharts::setSymbols(., 'star4')}() |> 
  {\(.) recharts::setToolbox(., lang = 'en', pos = 2)}() |> 
  {\(.) recharts::setTheme(., 'infographic', calculable = TRUE, bgColor = '#FBF2E9', 
                           animationEasing = 'BounceInOut', animationDuration = 500)}()

radarchart::chartJSRadar(
  skill[,-1], main = '技能評估', width = '100%', height = '100%', 
  maxScale = 10, labelSize = 'auto', showToolTipLabel = TRUE)
```

## 文書明細

以下乃此文書的文件信息。

- 文集建立日：2015-10-12
- 文集最新更新日：`r today('Asia/Tokyo')`
- `r R.version.string`
- [**rmarkdown**](https://github.com/rstudio/rmarkdown) 程序包版本：`r packageVersion('rmarkdown')`
- 文集版本：0.2.1
- 文集作者：[®γσ, ξηg Lιαη Ημ](https://beta.rstudioconnect.com/content/3091/ryo-eng.html)
- GitHub：[源代碼](https://github.com/scibrokes/owner)
- 其它附屬信息

```{r info, warning=FALSE, error=TRUE, results='asis'}
suppressMessages(require('formattable', quietly = TRUE))
suppressMessages(require('knitr', quietly = TRUE))
suppressMessages(require('kableExtra', quietly = TRUE))
suppressMessages(require('magittr', quietly = TRUE))

sys1 <- devtools::session_info()$platform |> 
    unlist() |> 
    {\(.) data.frame(row.names = 1:length(.), 
                     Category = names(.), session_info = .)}()

sys2 <- data.frame(Sys.info()) |> 
    {\(.) data.frame(Category = row.names(.), Sys.info = .[,1])}()

#remarks, dim(sys1), dim(sys2)
if (nrow(sys1) == 11 & nrow(sys2) == 8) {
  sys2 <- sys2 |> 
    {\(.) rbind(., data.frame(
    Category = c('rmarkdown', 'rsconnect', '當下'), 
    Sys.info = c(as.character(getwd()), 
                 as.character(packageVersion('rsconnect')), 
                 paste(as.character(lubridate::now('Asia/Tokyo')), 'JST 🌏'))))}()
  
} else if (nrow(sys1) == 10 & nrow(sys2) == 8) {
  sys1 %<>% rbind(., data.frame(Category = '', session_info = ''))
  
  sys2 <- sys2 |> 
    {\(.) rbind(., data.frame(
    Category = c('rmarkdown', 'rsconnect', '當下'), 
    Sys.info = c(as.character(getwd()), 
                 as.character(packageVersion('rsconnect')), 
                 paste(as.character(lubridate::now('Asia/Tokyo')), 'JST 🌏'))))}()
}

sys <- cbind(sys1, sys2) |> 
  {\(.) 
    kbl(., caption = '附加電腦會話信息：')}() |> 
  {\(.) 
    kable_styling(., bootstrap_options = c('striped', 'hover', 'condensed', 'responsive'))}() |> 
  {\(.) 
    row_spec(., 0, background = 'DimGrey', color = 'yellow')}() |> 
  {\(.) 
    column_spec(., 1, background = 'CornflowerBlue', color = 'red')}() |> 
  {\(.) 
    column_spec(., 2, background = 'grey', color = 'black')}() |> 
  {\(.) 
    column_spec(., 3, background = 'CornflowerBlue', color = 'blue')}() |> 
  {\(.) 
    column_spec(., 4, background = 'grey', color = 'white')}() |> 
  {\(.) 
    row_spec(., 11, bold = TRUE, color = 'yellow', background = '#D7261E')}()

rm(sys1, sys2)
sys
```
